item.title: Help Plz
item.dc:creator: @P_O0_00_Ned P O0 00 Ned
item.description:
@P_O0_00_Ned wrote:

Kk this isnt really an error, but i dont no where else to post.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("high") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4);

That adds skillxp to a chosen skill right?

How do i make a chosen skill something, eg

I want exactly 60k xp on attack, but if i already got 10k xp its gonna add 60k xp and ill have 70k xp.

Can any1 plz help.

Read full topic
